name: event_type
description: Type of security event (login, logout, failed_auth, permission_denied, etc.)

name: tenant_id
description: Tenant identifier where the event occurred

name: user_id
description: User ID associated with the event

name: ip_address
description: IP address where the event originated

name: resource_type
description: Type of resource accessed (employee, payroll, report, etc.)

name: failure_reason
description: Reason for failure if status is failure or blocked

name: session_id
description: Session identifier for tracking user sessions

name: request_id
description: Request identifier for correlation with API logs

name: geolocation
description: JSON string with geographic location data

name: additional_data
description: JSON string with additional event-specific data
